dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 221 IH: Obamacare Taxpayer Bailout Prevention Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Harris (for himself, Mrs. Blackburn, Mr. Roe of Tennessee, Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania, Mr. Stewart, Mr. Salmon, Mr. Massie, Mr. Gosar, Mr. Rothfus, Mr. LaMalfa, Mr. Loudermilk, Mr. Ribble, and Mr. Huelskamp) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To prevent a taxpayer bailout of health insurance issuers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Obamacare Taxpayer Bailout Prevention Act.

section.header: Prevention of bailout of health insurance issuers
section.text: The Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act is amended by striking section 1342 (42 U.S.C. 18062).
